API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.math.PlaneMath

type
class
version
3.1
since
0.3
Math functions for planes.

Static Variables

NEGATIVE : Int

Specifies a negative distance from a Point3D to a plane.

ON_PLANE : Int

Specifies a Point3D is on a plane.

POSITIVE : Int

Specifies a positive distance from a Point3D to a plane.

classifyPoint(default,method) : p_oPlane : sandy.core.data.Plane -> p_oPoint3D : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Int

Returns a classification constant depending on a points position relative to a plane.

The classification is one of PlaneMath.NEGATIVE PlaneMath.POSITIVE PlaneMath.ON_PLANE

computePlaneFromPoints(default,method) : p_oPointA : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oPointB : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oPointC : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Plane

Computes a plane from three specified points.

createFromNormalAndPoint(default,method) : p_oNormal : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> p_oPoint : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> sandy.core.data.Plane

Computes a plane from a normal vector and a specified point.

distanceToPoint(default,method) : p_oPlane : sandy.core.data.Plane -> p_oPoint : sandy.core.data.Point3D -> Float

Computes the distance between a plane and a 3D point (a vector here).

normalizePlane(default,method) : p_oPlane : sandy.core.data.Plane -> Void

Normalizes the plane.

Often before making some calculations with a plane you have to normalize it.
